original_text: One day you will cut the grass in your fields and then new grass will grow. You will store the grass that has grown on the hills. One day you will cut the grass in your fields and then new grass will grow. You will store the grass that has grown on the hills.
korean_text: 풀을 벤 후에는 새로 움이 돋나니 산에서 꼴을 거둘 것이니라

sentences.original_text: One day you will cut the grass in your fields
sentences.korean_translation: 언젠가 당신은 자신의 밭에 있는 풀을 벨 것입니다

sentences.original_text: and then new grass will grow
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그 다음 새로운 풀이 자랄 것입니다

sentences.original_text: that has grown on the hills
